review_blob: what a mess. if you combine some honey thats been sitting out in the sun for a week, some sweat from some old gym socks, and bear excrement fortified with rat dander, you get this beer

what was budweiser thinking? this shit is GROSS. regular Budweiser is AWESOME but this stuff is... well from start its colorful and has a vivid smooth taste that makes you say "hey this aint bad" sip 2 "hey this is kinda good" then on sip 3 as the reality of its shittiness sets in, you find yourself finishing it and saying "bartender, remind me to set this place on fire before i leave. you will get NO tip from me, just a middle finger and possibly a broken arm. thanks for not warning me BUTTHOLE"

i used to drink this stuff when i was super poor. it smells like trash and tastes like cheap beer. its the best cheap beer ive ever bought but thats like saying that Pepsi tastes good and not like ass.
if a dead bear rotted in a vat of this beer nobody would ever be able to tell because its already on that track.

watery and tastes like ball sweat from a fat guy who just ate at burgerking. great party beer when compared to natural light or milwaukees best. redeeming qualities: its beer. un-redeeming qualities: its beer

great aroma, good taste. until you drink it for a while. after a few of these you will be throwing in the towel because it shows its true gritty, sappy not-so-great taste and unfulfilling aftertaste with a big mean head. like a dragon puking into a bottle after it ate some live venison.

its great at first but once you drink it for a while you will find yourself stopping and saying "why am i holding this bottle of ape sweat in my hands? did a fat guy fart in this while i was in the restroom?"
Ultra sucky- nice color and aroma and tastes like a cement worker scraped his boot off with a skunks hardened corpse into a glass of popcorn butter
not too bad a beer. has an original taste, like no other beer. only problem is that the aftertaste makes you feel like a raccoon just sat on your face and let a silent fart

this shitty mess is just wrong. my friend drinks it and i always wish he would hit a telephone pole. i hate his guts and pray he dies just because he drinks this self-proclaimed "great beer" i think he should be mauled by bears just like this beer was mauled by sweaty gym socks

if you like your beer to hit your mouth like a strong pot of coffee and wake your ass right up, drink this shitty mess. tastes like a garbage man stopped at my house and gave me the coffee in his thermos. why people drink this expensive shit is beyond me. tastes like ASS
its incredible how good budweiser tastes and how bad this tastes. not a good choice. doesnt smell good and tastes like a womans yeast infection.

"Has the remarkable ability to get one drunk. And you can duct tape one to each hand and call yourself Edward Fortyhands"  LOL couldnt have said it better myself. the only redeeming quality about this beer is that you can take the empty bottle when your friend is done drinking it and break it over his head when he isnt looking

they get the ingredients for this beer this way- they wait until a spider leaves a dark musky corner and scrape it out then use that mixed with rat dander. they set that asides and start the brewing process. first, they go to where they make busch and they add the stuff the janitor sweeps up from around the vats. then they add the above mentioned ingredients, and tyou get this beer! NOTE: after this beer is shit out, they scrounge the sewer system and use what they find to make Hurricane High Gravity
nice beer. clean taste. good body, smooth entrance. just doesnt have the best aftertaste. heineken is much better choice
decent body and crisp taste. doesnt go down as well as it could, but overall it is a really good clean beer. enjoy!

mmmmmmm.... beer flavored water....
if you like flavored water, go for this beer. is great after you get done mowing your lawn and want a cold beer. if you are an idiot, that is. so many better choices than this.
good beer overall. nice crisp likeable flavor. goes down smooth and will make your taste buds pleased.

not sure why it got such a low rating by lots of people.
must be because:  A- it tastes like shit by itself and B- tastes like heaven with a slice of lime in it. i used to say "worst beer in the world is Corona, best beer in the world is Corona with a lime"
now i say best beer in the world is none, it hasnt been invented yet, and worst beer ever is high gravity and natural light

once my good friend got a keg of this for a party he threw. im sad to say i did a keg stand on it, but proud to say the stand only lasted .5 seconds before i couldnt possibly go any longer. literaly a half a second. and that was after my other friend lasted a half a second before spitting it out and having to be put down so he could almost pass out. vile beer. this is almost as worse as it gets besides natural light, milwaukees best and high gravity, high gravity being the worst.

i agree below with polomagnifico. during the brewing process for this beer, they have a fat guy squat over the big brewing vat and spray taco-bell diarreah into it then they mix in cyanide laced dog semen

god-aweful beer. i could spray diarreah in a can and it would be better than this. it for some reason was the #1 BYOB beer at weekend after-school parties. (geuss everyone was poor?) this is the kind of beer they use to torture intel out of prisoners of war. and im sure it is a VERY good method of doing so.

0 is my score. tastes terrible. at after-school keg parties, people would bring cases of this shit and drink it. wanna wake up in the morning with severe gut-rot and foul diarreah? go for this beer. no redeeming qualities except it gets you drunk and is cheap.

they dont call it the king of beers for nothing. people who say it is bad beer are just used to their high-fallooting more expensive beer. sure there are lots of better beers than Budweiser, but for a nice good ol fashioned picnic or just a cold brew after a hard days work, this is heaven. Period.

doesnt even deserve a .5 . it is the most nasty, vile gut-rot i have EVER drank. smells like nail polish and makes my stomach grumble and toss and feels like im dying from gut-rot minutes then hours after drinking it. it is just foul, filthy vileness at its worst.
i CANNOT stress just how vulgar and vomit-inducing this rat-swill trash garbage is
